text: Monica Angelucci (born 15 October 1968) is a Brazilian judoka who competed in the -48 kg category. She won a bronze medal at the 1986 Pan American Judo Championships. At the 1987 Pan American Games she became Pan American champion, and she won a bronze medal at the 1991 Pan American Games. She competed at the 1988 Summer Olympics, where judo was for women a demonstration sport, in the extra-lightweight event. == References == Category:1968 births Category:Judoka Category:Brazilian martial artists Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from SÃ£o Paulo
title: Monica Angelucci
